library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
library(httr)
res <- GET("https://sdmx.oecd.org/public/rest/data/OECD.WISE.INE,DSD_TIME_USE@DF_TIME_USE,1.0/all?dimensionAtObservation=AllDimensions&format=csvfilewithlabels")

df <- read_csv("https://sdmx.oecd.org/public/rest/data/OECD.WISE.INE,DSD_TIME_USE@DF_TIME_USE,1.0/all?dimensionAtObservation=AllDimensions&format=csvfilewithlabels")


df %>% 
  select(Country = `Reference area`, Measure, Sex = SEX, time = OBS_VALUE) %>% 
  filter(Sex != "_T") %>% 
  filter(Country %in% c("Denmark", "Sweden")) %>% 
  filter(str_detect(Measure, "work")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Sex, y = time, fill = Measure)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "stack") +
  facet_wrap(~ Country) +
  labs(
    title = "Stakkede søjlediagrammer for betalt og ubetalt arbejde",
    x = "Land",
    y = "Tid (minutter)",
    fill = "Arbejde"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
  
  
  
  ggplot(aes(x = Country, y = time, fill = Measure, group=Sex)) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge") +
  coord_flip()
